scripts.start: concurrently "webpack --color --stats minimal --config webpack.just.js && webpack --watch --color --stats minimal --config webpack.local.js" "node src/server/index.js local" "node src/server/proxy.local.js"
scripts.start:localqa: concurrently "webpack --color --stats minimal --config webpack.just.js && webpack --watch --color --stats minimal --config webpack.local.js" "node src/server/index.js local" "node src/server/proxy.localqa.js"
